name: Merge Files Using PDF.co
description:
Merge a mix of different document formats into a single PDF. Supported File Formats: PDF / DOC / DOCX / RTF/ Word / XLS / XLSX / CSV / JPG / PNG / TIFF / TXT / ZIP

About PDF.co:
PDF.co specializes in PDF processing solutions. This template was created by PDF.co and has not been tested by Make. For support, contact support@pdf.co.
